name: Church of Elleh
story: You are in the Church of Elleh, praying to Elleh the Great one last time before you begin your journey to recover an ancient weapon to help defeat Radagon Of The Golden Order
nav: Press 1 to go to the Ainsel river, press 2 to go to the cathedral of the forsaken, or press 3 to go to the bridge of sacrifice

name: Ainsel River
story: You are at the Ainsel River, there is darkness flowing through the water
nav: Press 1 to go to the Church of Elleh, 2 to go to the Cathedral of the Forsaken, or 3 to go to the Bridge of Sacrifice

name: Cathedral of the Forsaken
story: You are at the Cathedral of the Forsaken, you feel uneasy at the monument to death that stands before you.
nav: Press 1 to go to the Ainsel River, press 2 to go to the Ailing Village, or press 3 to go to Nokstella The Eternal city

name: Nokstella The Eternal City
story: You enter Nokstella the Eternal City that is hidden beneath the earth, you briefly explore before continuing your journey
nav: Press 1 to go to the Church of Elleh, Press 2 to go to the Castle Morne. Press 3 to go to the Ailing Village

name: Bridge of Sacrifice
story: You come across the Bridge of Sacrifice... you wonder why it has this rather odd name until you look over the edge and the explanation is looking right back at you
nav: Press 1 to go to the Ainsel River, press 2 to go to Oridys Rise, press 3 to go to the Ailing Village

name: Ailing Village
story: You enter the Ailing Village, this place is filled with dread and it gives you the heebie-jeebies
nav: Press 1 to go to the Church of Elleh. Press 2 to go to the Weeping Evergaol. Press 3 to go to the Witchbane Ruins

name: Castle Morne
story: You are at the Castle Morne, this area is ghostly as all you hear are mice scurrying about
nav: Press 1 to go to the Bellum Highway, Press 2 to go to the Witchbane Ruins, press 3 to go to the Ainsel River

name: Oridy's Rise
story: You come across an Oridys Rise, this should be a great place to look into where you'll be going next atop of the lookout tower
nav: Press 1 to go to the Royal Grave Evergaol, press 2 to go to the Bellum Highway, 3 to go to the Church of Elleh

name: Weeping Evergaol
story: You pass into the Weeping Evergaol, which makes you a bit nervous as you hear some faint whispers all around you.
nav: Press 1 to go to the Bridge of Sacrifice, and press 2 to go to the Royal Grave Evergaol and press 3 to go to the Castle Morne

name: Witchbane Ruins
story: You arrive at the Witchbane Ruins, you don;t see any witches in sight so you disappointingly carry on your journey to become Elden Lord
nav: Press 1 to go to the Castle Morne, or press 2 to go to the Royal Grave Evergaol, or press 3 to go to the Caelem Ruins

name: Bellum Highway
story: You come across the Bellum Highway, this should really speeds up your walk.
nav: Press 1 to go to the swamp of Aeonia, press 2 to go to Nokstella The Eternal City or press 3 to go to the Cathedral of the Forsaken

name: Royal Grave Evergaol
story: You enter the Royal Grave Evergaol, it's quite creepy meandering through here with the full moon...it has a grimacing face on it you give your eyes a rub and the grimacing face is gone.
nav: Press 1 to the Castle Morne, press 2 to look deeper into the graves or press 3 to go to the Cathedral of the Forsaken

name: Caelem Ruins
story: You enter the Caelem Ruins, you wonder to yourself why every place you come across is ruined and abandoned. Do you even want to be the Elden Lord of this place? You continue your journey onward.
nav: Press 1 to go to the Witchane Ruins, press 2 to explore the Ailing Village press 3 to go to the Weeping Evergaol

name: Redmane Castle
story: You enter the Redmane Castle and there's a little white mouse sneaking about. He approaches you while wearing a red sweater and some sneakers... you wonder if you're beginning to lose it as you adventure this Elden realm.
nav: Press 1 to go to the Ainsel River, press 2 to go to the Bellum Highway, press 3 to go to the Royal Grave Evergaol

name: Smoldering Church
story: You come across a smoldering church...and you hear something holy. You enter the destroyed doorway and you observe a mass happening with ghostly spirits you quickly run out of their to continue your journey
nav: Press 1 to the Royal Grave Evergaol, press 2 to go to the Redmane Castle or press 3 to go to the Forbidden Lands

name: Swamp of Aeonia
story: You enter the Swamp of Aeonia, the stench of this swampland is amost overpowering but you continue to soldier on to complete your task.
nav: Press 1 to go to the Ainsel River, press 2 to go to Nokstella The Eternal City, press 3 to go to the Volcano Cave

name: Forbidden Lands
story: You enter the Forbidden Lands, it's foggy and you wonder why it carries such an uninviting name and then you see it in the distance... the silhouette of a titan the size of the Oridys Rise lookout tower you quickly make haste and move beyond the land.
nav: Press 1 to the Swamp of Aeonia , press 2 to go to the Cathedral of the Forsaken or press 3 to go to the Volcano Cave

name: Guardian's Garrison
story: You enter the Guardians Garrison, Its empty almost as if this was deserted long ago.
nav: Press 1 to go to the Redmane Castle. Press 2 to go to the Wyndham Catacombs, Press 3 to go to the Heretical Rise

name: Heretical Rise
story: You enter the Heretical Rise, you see giants in the distance they seem unimpressed with your arrival and run towards you. You continue to wonder yet again why you're trying to become to Lord of such unruly and violent subjects.
nav: Press 1 to go to Nokstella The Eternal City, press 2 to go to the Guardians Garrison or press 3 to go to the Stargazers Ruins.

name: Stargazer's Ruins
story: You enter the Stargazers Ruins, the stars look spectacular and the destruction around you is equally as impressive at how vast it is. You make haste and continue your journey.
nav: Press 1 to go to the Church of Elleh 2 to look deeper into the ruins, and 3 to go to the Guardians Garrison

name: Volcano Cave
story: You come across a Volcano Cave...you end up exploring it as it's a cave under a Volcano what could possibly go wrong? Nothing actually, you safely explore the cave and continue onward.
nav: Press 1 to go to the Stargazers Ruins, 2 to go to the Wyndham Catacombs, 3 to go to the Ainsel River

name: Wyndham Catacombs
story: You enter the Wyndham Catacombs it is quite intimidating as it seems to be almost endless...the walls are filled with skulls of those who were here before. You're getting to your breaking point wondering if this journey is at all worth the risks involved.
nav: Press 1 to go to the Moonfolk Ruins, press 2 to go too the Altus Tunnel, press 3 to go to the Church of Elleh

name: Moonfolk Ruins
story: You come across the Moonfolk Ruins, It's dark and there's a full moon...spooky.
nav: Press 1 to go to the Forbidden Lands, press 2 to go to the Bridge of Sacrifice, press 3 to go to the Church of Elleh

name: Altus Tunnel
story: You enter the Altus Tunnel, you sense a level of importance associated with this pathway.
nav: Press 1 to go to the Bellum Highway, press 2 to go to the Witchbane Ruins and press 3 to go to the Elden Throne.

name: Elden Throne
story: Finally, you come across the Elden Throne you see the Sword of Night and Flame on the ground...you also see the Ruins Greatsword you can only carry one which do you choose to wield as the Elden Lord?
nav: Press 1 for a mystery, press 2 for the Ruins Greatsword, or press 3 for the Sword of Night and Flame

name: ruins greatsword
story: You found the Ruins Greatsword, you win!

name: sword of night and flame
story: You found the sword or night and flame, you win!

name: invaded
story: You were invaded in your quest, you lose!

name: bottomless pit
story: You fell into a bottomless pit! You lose!
